section.title: Internal System Properties
section.para: This section describe the system properties which are defined by Package Drone itself.

simplesect.title: package.drone.admin.announce.file.notPosix
simplesect.para: Disable setting POSIX file permissions on the admin token file.

By default the admin token file will be written so that only the Package Drone user can read this file. However this is only supported on system which support POSIX file permissions in Java. If this causes problems for you setup, then you can disable this behavior by setting the value to false.
